languages.text: "Точно? Ну тогда, как по мне — дела наши идут скверно!" {n}Солдат тараторит, как пулемет:{/n} "Странные они, мятежники эти. Обычный бунт мы бы подавили — мы же все таки не обычные простолюдины, а райкадцы, корабельная элита династии Винтерскейл. Но эти, они какие-то... буйные. Ничего не боятся".

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."
languages.original_text: "Точно? Ну тогда, как по мне — дела наши идут скверно!" {n}Солдат тараторит, как пулемет:{/n} "Странные они, мятежники эти. Обычный бунт мы бы подавили — мы же все таки не обычные простолюдины, а райкадцы, корабельная элита династии Винтерскейл. Но эти, они какие-то... буйные. Ничего не боятся".

traits.locale_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words are flying at the rate of machine gun fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. Nothing scares them."

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words are flying at the rate of machine gun fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. Nothing scares them."

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words ricochet off his teeth like machine gun shells.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words ricochet off his teeth like machine gun shells.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

"You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

languages.text: "Wirklich nicht? Nun, wenn Ihr mich fragt, ist alles ziemlich beschissen!" {n}Seine Worte kommen so schnell gerattert wie das Feuer eines Maschinengewehrs.{/n} "Diese Rebellen sind merkwürdig. Einen normalen Aufstand hätten wir mühelos niedergeschlagen — wir sind kein einfacher Pöbel, wir sind Rykadier, die Elite des Hauses Winterzunder. Aber diese Leute, die sind ... brutal. Sie kennen keine Angst."
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich nicht? Nun, wenn Ihr mich fragt, ist alles ziemlich beschissen!" {n}Seine Worte kommen aus seinem Mund wie Maschinengewehrsalven.{/n} "Diese Rebellen sind merkwürdig. Einen normalen Aufstand hätten wir mühelos niedergeschlagen — wir sind kein einfacher Pöbel, wir sind Rykadier, die Elite des Hauses Winterzunder. Aber diese Leute, die sind ... brutal. Sie kennen keine Angst."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, je vais vous dire... La situation est catastrophique ! » {n}Il débite ses paroles à la vitesse d'une mitrailleuse.{/n} « Ces rebelles sont étranges... Nous aurions facilement étouffé une émeute classique. Après tout, nous sommes des Rykadiens, l'élite navale de la maison Winterscale, pas des guignols ! Mais ces gens-là sont d'une tout autre trempe, ils n'ont peur de rien ! »
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, je vais vous dire... La situation est catastrophique ! » {n}Il débite ses paroles à la vitesse d'une mitrailleuse.{/n} « Ces rebelles sont étranges... Nous aurions facilement étouffé une émeute classique. Après tout, nous sommes des Rykadiens, l'élite navale de la maison Winterscale, pas des guignols ! Mais ces gens-là sont d'une tout autre trempe, ils n'ont peur de rien ! »

languages.text: “您真的不会吗？好吧，如果您要我说的话，我个人觉得，一切都糟透了！”{n}他的话语就像伐木枪的子弹一样，从他嘴里倾泻出来。{/n}“那些叛军很不对劲。放在平时，这种普通的骚乱我们早就搞定了。要知道，我们可不是普通人，我们是莱卡德人，是温特斯凯尔家族的海军精英。可那些叛军，他们……很邪恶，而且无所畏惧。”
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: “您真的不会吗？好吧，如果您要我说的话，我个人觉得，一切都糟透了！”{n}话语就像机关枪的子弹一样，从他嘴里倾泻出来。{/n}“那些叛军很不对劲。放在平时，这种普通的骚乱我们早就搞定了。要知道，我们可不是普通人，我们是莱卡德人，是温特斯凯尔家族的海军精英。可那些叛军，他们……很邪恶，而且无所畏惧。”

languages.text: 「ホントですか？でしたら、僕からすれば、事態はかなり深刻です！」{n}激しいスタッバーの砲撃のように、青年の言葉がその口から放たれる。{/n}「あの暴徒たちは妙なんです。普通の暴動なら簡単に鎮圧できるのに…僕らは一般市民じゃない、ウィンタースケール家の海軍でも精鋭のライカド人です。ですが、あの人たちは、奴らは…凶暴なんです。恐れを知らない」
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: 「ホントですか？でしたら、僕からすれば、事態はかなり深刻です！」{n}マシンガンの砲撃のように、青年の言葉がその歯から放たれる。{/n}「あの暴徒たちは妙なんです。普通の暴動なら簡単に鎮圧できるのに…僕らは一般人じゃない、ウィンタースケール家の海軍でも精鋭のライカド人です。ですが、あの人たちは、奴らは…凶暴なんです。恐れを知らない」

languages.text: «¿De verdad que no? Pues entonces, si me pregunta, ¡las cosas están bastante jodidas!». {n}Sus palabras brotan como proyectiles de ametralladora.{/n} «Esos rebeldes son extraños. Habríamos sofocado fácilmente un motín normal, no somos plebeyos, somos rykadianos, la élite naval de la casa Winterscale. Pero esa gente, es... despiadada. No conocen el miedo».
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad que no? Pues entonces, si me pregunta, ¡las cosas están bastante jodidas!». {n}Sus palabras resuenan en sus dientes como proyectiles de ametralladora.{/n} «Esos rebeldes son extraños. Habríamos sofocado fácilmente un motín normal, no somos plebeyos, somos rykadianos, la élite naval de la Casa Winterscale. Pero esa gente, son... despiadados. No conocen el miedo».

languages.text: "Cidden mi? Madem öyle, bana sorarsanız işler çığırından çıktı!" {n}Sözler, ağzından güdük ateşi hızında çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu asiler bir tuhaf. Normal bir isyan olsa sıkıntı yok, çabucak bastırırdık. Bizler öyle alelade adamlar değil, Winterscale Hanesi'ne seçkin bahriyeliler yetiştiren Rykad halkıyız ama o asiler, onlar... Vahşiler. Korku nedir bilmiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "You really won't? Well then, if you ask me, things are pretty rotten!" {n}His words come flying at the rate of stubber fire.{/n} "Those rebels are strange. We would've easily quelled a normal riot — we're not some commoners, we're Rykadians, the naval elite of House Winterscale. But those people, they're... vicious. They know no fear."

traits.locale_text: "Cidden mi? Madem öyle, bana sorarsanız işler çığırından çıktı!" {n}Sözler, ağzından güdük ateşi hızında çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu asiler bir tuhaf. Normal bir isyan olsa sıkıntı yok, çabucak bastırırdık. Bizler öyle alelade adamlar değil, Winterscale Hanesi'ne seçkin bahriyeliler yetiştiren Rykad halkıyız ama o asiler, onlar... Vahşiler. Korku nedir bilmiyorlar."
